coverage: A serene landscape showcases majestic, snow-capped mountains towering beside a calm, crystal-clear lake at sunset. The rugged peaks are mirrored perfectly in the tranquil waters, enhancing their grandeur. The warm, golden light of the setting sun casts a soft glow from the west, creating long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the sky. Surrounding the lake, lush green forests and gentle hills provide a picturesque backdrop. The scene emanates peace and harmony, evoking a deep sense of relaxation and natural beauty.
